file.name: comms.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Comms
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/comms":
    post:
      description: Send New Comm
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/SendComm"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Newly created comm
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Comm"
  "/comms/{id}":
    get:
      description: Retrieve Comm
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Comm found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Comm"
        '404':
          description: No comm has been found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  schemas:
    SendComm:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
      required:
        - email
    Comm:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        commId:
          type: string
        status:
          enum: ["Pending", "Delivered", "Failed"]
      required:
        - id
        - commId
        - status
    Error:
      additionalProperties: false
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
      required:
        - message
